summary: Adds a overpowered weapon to the game with the skin of a Daedric sword, but with the power of a Dragon....
descriptionHtml:
This mod will add a weapon that looks like a Daedric sword, but with the power of a Dragon....
=============================================================================================
If You want the craft the weapon, it\'s in the Daedric section.

The weapon is ALSO located on top of the box in Alvor and Sigred\'s house in Riverwood.
=============================================================================================
This weapon has a long range and is REALLY fast. Also shoots fire
=============================================================================================
 If there are any problems, feel free to report them to me.
=============================================================================================
How to install:

Download the .esp and place it in your data folder....
author: G0Dx
